outline:
1. to wash, rinse, overflow, engulf, rinse or wash off
    1. (Qal)
      1. to overflow
      2. to flow, run
      3. to rinse or wash off
    2. (Niphal) to be swept away, be rinsed out
    3. (Pual) to be rinsed, be scoured and rinsed
kjv_def: drown, (over-) flow(-whelm, rinse, run, rush, (throughly) wash (away).
strongs_def: to gush; by implication, to inundate, cleanse; by analogy, to gallop, conquer
